name: Fun Through Space
description:
Hey, this is MD. Sad Adnan and these are the changes I made to the game -

  1.   Added 3 new levels with a harder target to achieve.
  2. Added New Label to show life count
  3.  Added New Label to show Speed of the spaceship
  4. After each kills the speed gets increased by 0.5
  5. Added Label to show the target amount of spaceships needed to kill to go to next level 
  6. Added Label to show how much enemy is killed already
  7. Added Heart object to get and increase the life.

Thanks, Everyone.
